Plot: Bounce. Bounce. Bounce. You’re Dead! So, you want to be a sports star? The question you gotta ask yourself: “Does AllSport want you be a sports star? Because if they do, you are. If they don’t, you’re dead. It may not be fair, but nothing’s fair in love, war and sports. Balkind scores a touchdown, a basket and a homerun with DEAD BALL. Michael Balkind is the author of the Deadly Sports Mysteries & more. His novel Sudden Death was endorsed by literary greats including James Patterson and Clive Cussler. He appeared on ESPN’s The Pulse and was featured on the cover of Publishers Weekly. Balkind graduated from Syracuse University and currently resides in New York.
